website_summaries.verdict: A good home-use and beginner’s welder that offers versatile welding options when tackling smaller metal repair tasks.
pros: Option to use either gas or gasless welding is a plus for some owners, particularly those who need to weld outside
Users find it to be a good beginner’s welder – best for light metalworking projects
cons: Gas hose connection can get in the way of the tank when welder is mounted on a cart
Feeding new wire through liner can be tricky
A few reports of defective welders on arrival

website_summaries.verdict: A durable MIG welder at a reasonable price that features controls which allow you to achieve high quality results.
pros: This MIG welder has two dial controls with digital display so you can fine tune the voltage output and the wire feed speed
The unit comes with everything you need to get started and it works with 110 or 120 voltage
It comes with Lotos Technology's 1-year limited warranty, so you can purchase with confidence
cons: Occasionally, a unit has problems with the wire feed sticking, which is not an ideal situation

customer_reviews.title: Real nice so far...
customer_reviews.text: I just got my lotos mig 140 set up, and made some passes with it on some 1/8th inch box tubing. Everything works perfect. I'm using the wire that came with the machine and I picked up an 80cf bottle of 75/25 gas. I'll be making a video on YouTube. It'll be called lotos mig 140. Watch "Lotos mig 140" on YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Mace119

customer_reviews.title: will fit most needs.
customer_reviews.text: make sure you have a 20 amp outlet/breaker! it will pop a 15a within minutes. If you weld outside, this welder is awesome because you dont need shielding gas, and you can run (a rugged) extension cord off a 110 outlet to your work. Great for fixing random stuff, or just playing around welding random stuff. The 035 wire is great for this and feeds pretty well. If you need a deep weld, this thing set to 10 will easily weld the 1/4 inch steel they say it will.
customer_reviews.author: Jason in NH

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as my Lincoln did
customer_reviews.text: Works as good as my Lincoln did. Only complaint is where the gas hose connects. When connected the line sticks straight out the middle of the back of the unit, hitting the gas bottle while mounted on a welding cart. Needs a 90 to clear properly.
customer_reviews.author: poco

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy but so far it all works.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I would write a better review for Lotos, but I’m not so happy with this shipment. First off I received a different gun than the one in the picture. Secondly the gun was not completely assembled. Last of all I notice a little rust on the inside of the welder (near where wire spool goes). I will be contacting Lotos to receive the correct gun. Hopefully they can provide what I really paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, easy flux setup
customer_reviews.text: Great MIG welder. Only welding I have done previously is with stick/arc welding. Super easy to setup. Only reference I used were some videos about MiG welding on YouTube. Never opened the manual. Purchased some Forney consumables with M6 threads and work fine. Have a 10lb spoil of flux, easy feed, runs great. The torch it comes with looks and feels of high quality, which was my deciding factor between Lotos and Lincoln. The stock torch for a similar level Lincoln looked like it could fall apart at any minute. Great to use on lighter gauge steel, I will still probably use my arc welder for the thick stuff. The MIG is much more fun to use. Thanks LOTOS!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chabot

customer_reviews.title: Got good welds on the first few attempts
customer_reviews.text: Well, for a first mig machine, I probably will never buy another stick welder. Got good welds on the first few attempts. After I bought this one, tried a Miller Multimatic 215 at work. cant really tell a difference. As far as household and farm use I think it will be the optimal solution. Can't tell you how it will be in a few years from now. Just saying, you get a good initial product. it is a good product to learn with.
customer_reviews.author: drbass

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: What more can you ask for for 300 bucks? Works great and connects to any outlet. I’ve been using flux because gas is a pain, but I’m sure it would be even better with gas.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Great little addition for the shop
customer_reviews.text: I do all kinds of crafts and tampering and this little fella seems to be holding out quite well. Built a steel stand, welded protection frame around my trailer lights and fixed a Stainless steel pot handle and it did all of them no problem. Of course if you plan on welding really thick steel may want to consider something a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great welder for the money . I run miller series at work an this welder runs better. I'd buy o e as fast as you can get one before there gone . I build custom cars an trucks . an have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Benedict

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little machine
customer_reviews.text: It's a good little machine. I'm still putting it through its paces, but I managed to get full fusion on 1/4" steel (single pass, 0.035 flux core) with some determination and mild settings adjustments. The digital read out is nice for its class, especially for the price. Not terribly fond of the trigger being a toggle on/off, but that might be common for home welders, I don't really know. Would definitely recommend for a first welder or something for home projects.
customer_reviews.author: chris hilliard

customer_reviews.title: absolutely works perfect with flux core wire without
customer_reviews.text: This 110 Mig welder is a must have for any hot rodder, shop owner or enthusiast, absolutely works perfect with flux core wire without gas
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis A. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last long.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE....I DELT WITH LOTOS COSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY TRIED HELPING ME FIX MY WIRE FEED MECHANISM AND AFTER NOT BEING ABLE TOO THEY SENT ME A NEW REPLACEMENT MACHINE. THEY WENT ABOVE AND BEYOND IN COSTOMER SERVICE. THANK YOU LOTOS. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT AND COMPANY. BEEN ABLE TO FINISH MY PROJECTS. 've had this welder just at a year. Only used it a handful of times and I have been battling with the wire feed. It will feed than all of a sudden it stops feeding and the wheels just spin inside. I've cleaned and cleaned used different stuff. Probably only getting worse..........
customer_reviews.author: nate r.

customer_reviews.title: Oh hell no!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot tried to like and use this welder for 3 years. And I'll be honest this is not my first welder, far from it and it is unreliable and I wish I had not paid the money for it. I've been in contact with a manufacturer and I have tried, and tried, and tried to dial it in but it just is not a good welder. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built welder
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Well built, solid. Love the analog voltage and wire speed settings. CONS: Wire feed frequently "sticks". Determined that a quality wire makes it work better, but still not good. The switch between wire feed and gun feed needs to be in a different location. Too easy to bump when "unsticking" wire. Also, had frequent instances where wire stopped going up the wire feed and spooled into the inside of the welder due to a wire kink. A better design is needed.
customer_reviews.author: JayNak

customer_reviews.title: Great welder at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I order this welder for some reason there must have been some mix up the first one I received the box was damaged contents inside damaged and some missing. Notified amazon had another within three days. I’ve been in the automotive business 30 years I’ve used welders during that whole time. I’ve got sed millers Lincoln’s Hobarts. In my opinion this welder welds just as good as a 2000 dollar welder Quick set up. I would most definitely recommend this welder to anyone. As far as amazon great job on getting a replacement to me promptly
customer_reviews.author: TYSON LEAVITT

customer_reviews.title: Missing paperwork, part help from support, all missing
customer_reviews.text: Well , I've been having a bit of trouble with support, piece missing NO PAPERWORK, product list, have asked repeatedly for missing part, paperwork and to no avail. While price for it was good , supports NOT
customer_reviews.author: sherrie davis

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! The wire drive runs very smooth. It can handle 10# spools. It has fine-tuning variable control for voltage and wire speed. The torch handle is extremely heavy duty. This thing is solid! It will give a Lincoln a run for its money any day!
customer_reviews.author: OnAnIsland

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great! Nothing bad to say!
customer_reviews.text: This welder is great! I use it for a lot of stainless steel work for automotive projects! Very easy to use and dial in! Comfortable as well! Nothing but good things from me!
customer_reviews.author: jake brown

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after some mixed reviews. It works great for what we've needed, easy to use, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended, Two reasons:
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend: I mostly don’t like this because I can’t get the penetration needed on 3/16 steel. This is a huge issue as I’ve wanted $367 on this as I need to buy a bigger unit, even though it’s advertised to handle this thickness. The other issue I have is that the carry handle broke out of the plastic and caused he welder to fall. I’ve managed to somewhat straighten the case but it’s visibly damaged still.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice weld when using gas
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get away from flux core so I purchased this unit. Nice weld when using gas. Easy to adjust feed/heat settings. Fine tune with digital read-outs.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Soto

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the house.have been welding for many yrs and this thing is junk..spoolgin surges and regulator ball doesnt move and was a big waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not having a great experience  with it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far all I can get it to do is sit and sputter I'm only welding 14 16ga tubing but does not have enough heat and will not send wire through the gun consistently while welding if I'm missing something please lmk but I've been a AWS certified welder for about 7 to 8 years now and am pretty well all around welder so I'd like to no why it says it can weld 1/4 inch plate when it barely gets hot enough to weld 16 gauge sheet metal
customer_reviews.author: Brockman77taman!

customer_reviews.title: A hidden gem!!
customer_reviews.text: This welder is amazing! Easy to use and easily welds 1/4”. I mostly use it for 3/16”. This is a great machine and the quality is definitely there. I would definitely buy this again even over the more “quality” brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good feed and voltage control
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good feed and voltage control. Decent quality ground clamp, easy to set up. Easy to change polarity. Cons: Limited instruction manual, customer service calls go to a voice mail. Flow meter received does not work.
customer_reviews.author: JT Bean

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 welders and this is a good deal and looks great in blue!!!!
customer_reviews.text: working great!! I have been welding a lot and have used almost 2 rolls. 1 flux core and one aluminum great deal for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this at all. It's a good machine for beginners and won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works way better than expected, especially when you find the correct settings!
customer_reviews.author: BEAUBANE

customer_reviews.title: Welds as good as my bigger machine
customer_reviews.text: Welds as good as my bigger machine, wire feed and adjustments are something you would expect from a much more expensive welder, Very Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Working well
customer_reviews.text: Hubs is happy with this welder. It seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Givens

customer_reviews.title: very good welder
customer_reviews.text: I liked it was easy to use it was as good as the Lincoln
customer_reviews.author: Ricanron

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the welder it worked, mostly. Torch trigger would stop functioning intermittently. Second time I used it it stopped working completely. Machine turns on and hums, but won't feed wire and won't arc. Called the company, I can pay to have it shipped back, but the warranty ONLY covers the body of the machine. They won't warranty the torch hose or any of the other parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Welder works great
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with the regulator, sent them and email and with no problem at all they sent me a new one. No questions asked did not ask for the old one. Best support I've had from any company. Yes I would buy from them again and highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting better results every time I use it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mig welder So far it is doing a great Job.
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service, they can teach a few companies how to treat their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Montes de Oca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine
customer_reviews.text: Seriously impressed, really nice little unit. Spool gun set up is a great combo
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellect Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had absolutely no problems with this welder. It's welding very good. The wire feeds well.
customer_reviews.author: slimm

customer_reviews.title: Love it works excelent just as good if not better ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it works excelent just as good if not better than a Miller or the other ones and a way better price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gas regulator does not work
customer_reviews.text: I like the welder but the second time I used it the flow meter did not work ; can seller send me a new regulator ?
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: ALUMINUM FEEDER
customer_reviews.text: I love that the product has a industrial aluminum feeder for long lasting welding :) very satisfied with this product would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Parker Garten

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Xmas that my Son loves.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my son and he loves it. He is using it for his old school Cadillac that he is fixing to show in car shows.
customer_reviews.author: Barby

customer_reviews.title: More Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't weld like it claims also send it back a month ago and still haven't received my refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent welder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the cost. Not the most well made but hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Allender-zivic

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent welder at an affordable price. It has handled every job with excellent results. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not imressed
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok for less than a year then wire feed quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great welder
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a great welder,used for two months with no problems
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good welder
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. Only had a week and he has used it a ton!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible welder for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I could write a long review I guess...but no need. This is one of the best welders I've ever used/had. I actually like it better than the Snap-On MM250 I had a while back. It's a workhorse, and has lasted over a year without even a hiccup. The only thing I had a problem with was feeding the wire into the actual lining when loading new wire. I had to unscrew the lead, bring the wire through and manually insert it into the lead, then reconnect the lead. This is not a big deal at all, just a note. I've used other more expensive brands without being impressed by them as much as I am with this one. Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: zman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works good showed up on time. Have not had any issues with it
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works great for light projects and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Works great for light projects and easy to put together. You will have to by a gas cylinder which will cost between a $100-$150 depending on the size.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. No issues
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No issues. Have used for exhaust work and sheet metal / body work. Before getting this I had a 120v flux core welder, this is so much easier to use with less burn through on thin material. Have not used on anything heavier than 16ga so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: roymac

customer_reviews.title: Turd furgison
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine due to the high rating it had. Well something must have changed between 2016 and 2017. The one I got was horrible. I have sent it back to Amazon. The wire speed and voltage controls were unresponsive until the midway point.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: Great welder!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this little welder so far. I have been welding a new gate using flux core wire and it worked like a champ right out of the box. I'm making the gate out of 1/8" thick square tube and it does an excellent job of joining the pieces, especially considering that I learned to weld with a stick welder some 40 years ago and haven't done it since! I heartily recommend this little welder for around the house/small farm repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Harry S. Organs

customer_reviews.title: So Far I Couldn't Be Happier
customer_reviews.text: Received welder on time and it was well packaged and in good shape. I purchased a bottle of Argon/CO2 and the welder worked perfectly. Have not used it a lot yet but so far I think it is a good unit with a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Crowwing

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, and welder was exactly as stated. Set it up and after the initial adjustments, ran my first weld and was very satisfied. Have used it several times now. Quick and easy to set up, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Mahenski

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the Lotos Mig 140 Welder as a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Lotos Mig Welder I purchased is very well constructed, iand very durable, It was easy to assemble and operate. Lotos has excellent customer service and a great warranties for the products they sell.
customer_reviews.author: LaRell J. Greenhalgh

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for around the house
customer_reviews.text: for the money this is a great welder. If you just like to tinker, or use around the house, save some money and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great welder. Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting to weld and I'm very satisfied with it thus far. It does come with the option to use gas or gas-less mig welding.
customer_reviews.author: Mattpeeler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: still having trouble learning how to set dit right for the job i am doing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really really good aluminum welder it worked extremely well I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: iPhone user

customer_reviews.title: ... I would suggest it to anyone it was a great
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how well made this welder is I would suggest it to anyone it was a great machine
customer_reviews.author: Bill wooall

customer_reviews.title: Lotos doesn't sell just the tips, anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this welder and it functions just fine. I have welded a project that required a lot of welding and this held up great. However, I will give them a one(1) star for the parts. They don't sell extra tips by themselves. Lincoln and others do. I called their office twice and emailed them. They have a pack that has a bunch of things that I don't need. These tips can't be bought on the internet. If you run out of tips you are out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: HonestB
customer_reviews.text: Ok unit . Plastic drive . Not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Honest b

customer_reviews.title: Great welder at an even better price
customer_reviews.text: Great little welder, with flux core it welds decent but with gas it welded beyond my expectations. Hands down for the price? You can not beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Caveat: Only a trivial amount of welding experience, ...
customer_reviews.text: Caveat: Only a trivial amount of welding experience, and that on the HF 90Amp AC welder (POS). Setup was intuitive, though the pressure gauge housing was bent causing the face to bend. I may have corrected it, and I don't anticipate this is a chronic issue. I took to the 13G test metal and promptly blew through it using the same attitude as required with the 90A welder. This one should be the starter welder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Fixed my wrought iron fence with power to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Khristian W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love my mig welder
customer_reviews.text: I love my mig welder. I am using c5 gas vs flux because it weld better. My boss who is a first was able to weld a bead line like a person who been welding for a long time. I am teaching him as we get better using the machine.
customer_reviews.author: FAST FRED

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Lotos MIG 140 wire flux cored welder for ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Lotos MIG 140 wire flux cored welder for the price and dual voltage with gas. It can do aluminum and stainless steel too.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: this is for our son-in-law's birthday. It seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: this is for our son-in-law's birthday. It seems to be just want we wanted in a welder given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rhio Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The welder has not worked well since I received it. There were always problems with the wire feed. I thought it would be an upgrade from my $100 harbor freight mig flux-core only welder. Now the whole thing is broken. It makes a loud humming and trips the breaker when it is on. I have tried to get support and there is no response. There is also not my info online about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Will not do simple welds with flux core or correct wire and argon gas.
customer_reviews.text: Will not do simple welds with flux core or correct wire and argon gas. I had a Snap-On welder that worked-out-of-the-box, I works with this for 2 hours trying every combination of settings before I threw it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: ... i try it and i was si disapionted not good penetration its just for bodyshop or very ligth metal ...
customer_reviews.text: wen i got it it impress me was big and heavy so i try it and i was si disapionted not good penetration its just for bodyshop or very ligth metal work

product_meta.title: LOTOS MIG140 140 Amp MIG Wire Welder, Flux Core & Aluminum Gas Shielded Welding with 2T/4T Switch Argon Regulator, Metal Wire Feeder, Black/Red
product_meta.description:
About Lotos Technology
Headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, USA, Lotos Technology supplies quality welding and cutting tools to small businesses and Do-It-Yourself (DIY) buyers. Since 2007, our products have gained recognition as a reputable source for affordable industrial and consumer based portable plasma cutters and welders. We are proud of our product, quality and after-sale service. We offer quality welding and cutting tools to small businesses and DIY buyers. Our tools help you with your DIY projects to "Cut it, Weld it, Build it" to get the job done!

The LOTOS MIG140 features a 140 amp MIG welder that can weld at industrial quality and performance at a very affordable price. The most versatile and perfect welder for do-it-yourself home users as well as professional users. The LOTOS MIG140 is also spool gun capable for welding aluminum. It can be easily connected to your existing 110V wall outlet and quickly setup within 10 minutes or less. It handles industrial standard 4" or 8" wire spools and incorporates a thermal overload protection system to protect your welder.
feature_bullets: ★ Aluminum Wire Feeder—The durable high quality aluminum wire feeder offers a much more stable and better welding experience.
★2T/4T—2T(Manual)/4T(Semi-auto) switch is now available; you can release your finger for long time welding job.
★ More Precisely--Customer can adjust the wire feeder speed and welding voltage more precisely with the 2 digital displayers. new designed ground cable quick connector.
★Rated Output--140-amp MIG welder; mild/stainless steel: 24 gauge - 3/16"; input voltage: 110/120v; it can be easily connected to your existing 110/120v wall outlet.
★Multi Use--Welding stainless steel, mild steel, aluminum (with a spool gun, not include in the package, need to purchase separate) and other metal materials.
★Buy with Confidence--As We Offer 30-Day 100% Satisfaction or Money Back and 1 Year Limited ;
★What’s Include--MIG torch, Ground Clamp Cable, Gas Hose, Argon Regulator, . 023” (0. 6mm) & . 035” (0. 9mm) Contact Tips, Welding Mask and Wire. Wire range: 0. 025 in. - 0. 030 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
